text: Juan Luna de San Pedro y Novicio Ancheta (; October 23, 1857 – December 7, 1899) was a Filipino nationalist, painter, artist, sculptor and Revolution activist. A prominent artist, he has been called the Philippines' national painter. == Other websites == * INQUIRER.net: Juan Luna's work * López Memorial Museum: Juan Luna Category:1857 births Category:1899 deaths Category:Painters from Asia Category:Sculptors Category:Filipino politicians Category:Filipino autobiographers Category:Filipino artists
title: Juan Luna
